706780f-a.title: Brooklyn: Shore Road - 82nd Street
706780f-a.text:
(1)
Shore Road, at the N.E. corner of 82nd Street, showing the Isaac E. Bergen house built in 1890.  (This house in 1890, was south of 82nd Street; however in the atlas of 1908, 1916 and 1929 it appears at
the above location).
1922.
Eugene L. Armbruster Collection.
(2)
The same, showing a closer view.
1922.
Eugene L. Armbruster Collection.
